content.prompt: Which of the following best exemplifies the use of multifactor authentication to protect an online banking system?

choices.label: When a user resets a password for an online bank account, the user is required to enter the new password twice.
When multiple people have a shared online bank account, they are each required to have their own unique username and password.
After entering a password for an online bank account, a user must also enter a code that is sent to the userâ€™s phone via text message.
An online bank requires users to change their account passwords multiple times per year without using the same password twice.

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Evaluate the use of computing based on legal and ethical factors.
